title: SetUTCTimeSynchronizationRecipients (Method)
text:
METHOD SetUTCTimeSynchronizationRecipients : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Sets the UTC_Time_Synchronization_Recipients-List of this BACnet object.

rows.Name: uiListCount
rows.Comment: The length of the list in the following pointer.

rows:
The list data containing elements according to the given
count.
